page.title: 11THE STRAWBERRY FIELDS.
page.content: {Mrs Brain}rented the{strawberry fields in{1960.}About half a tonne in the height of the season was taken out in the way of small plastic containers. Most of the women and children who lived in Broad Town worked in the {strawberry fields}for{wages.}She had rented it for five years .It was bought by{Wilcon Ltd.}in{1970. First of all{Wilcon}built a show home on the corner of what was going to be {Broadacres}.The biggest houses are 1,2,2A & 3 there are 24 houses in {Broadacres.}One of them is numbered 2A because they forgot to number the show home.So they numbered it 2A. At present 5 children from{Broadacres attend{Broad Town School.
